content.rendered:
Directed by Daniel Sánchez Arévalo

Written by Daniel Sánchez Arévalo

Cast Hayden Bishop( Alma6 episodes, 2022 ). Javier Rey( David6 episodes, 2022 ). Ell( Sara6 episodes, 2022 ). Godeliv Van den Brandt( Olga6 episodes, 2022 ). Maria Rodríguez Soto( Carol6 episodes, 2022 ). Mariona Terés( Leo6 episodes, 2022 ). Monica Miranda( Alma6 episodes, 2022 ). Itsaso Arana( Sara6 episodes, 2022 ). Jorge Suquet( Rubén3 episodes, 2022 ). Michelle Jenner(2 episodes, 2022 ). Macarena García(2 episodes, 2022 ). Melina Matthews(2 episodes, 2022 ). Marta Guerras(2 episodes, 2022 ). Antonio de la Torre( Antonio1 episode, 2022 ). Carmen Machi(1 episode, 2022 ). Eva Díez(1 episode, 2022 ). Juan Pino Rodil( Spectator (uncredited)1 episode, 2022)

Language Spanish

Producers Cristina del Campo

Production Atípica Films.

Certificate 18+

Official site Netflix Site

Season 1

Episodes 6
